biotools.summary:
Mapping the RNA structural landscape of viral genomes.

ScanFold is an RNA sequence scanning pipeline which attempts to identify potentially functional RNA secondary structures. This is done by first scanning a single input sequence to identify regions which generate negative thermodynamic z-scores (a hallmark of functional RNA sequences), and subsequently identifying the specific base pairs which we….

Welcome to the ScanFold web server.

Using the ScanFold web server you can identify regions of an RNA sequence which generate unusually stable secondary structures (one of the hallmarks of a functional RNA)
